name: Pretzel (milkymilkface)
description:
Grab some friends, flip the tiles and tangle yourselves together!

Select Run game above to play Pretzel in your browser! Reveal two body parts and, as a group, organise who can bring these parts together. Make sure they remain in contact for the rest of the game. Connecting the first two together is easy, but as you tap the button again and again, you'll accumulate new connections. See how tangled you can get!

Alternatively, use Pretzel to construct a short dance! Either alone or in groups, follow the bodily prompts as an impetus for new movement. Instead of just drawing the two points together, explore their relationship in space... their conjoined presence, scale, force or weight. Play with the motion of your body like a kinetic toy.

Pretzel was originally the Pretzel card game, which received an Honorable Mention in the 2016 Cardboard Edison Awards. An iOS and Android version called Pretzel Pocket was released in 2017 but is no longer supported.
